summary: Sex toys are objects used to make people feel good during sexual activities. They can be things like vibrators or artificial genitals. These toys can be bought in many places, like special shops, online, or even in some pharmacies and stores. They are designed to look like real body parts and can vibrate or not. Some other related items, like BDSM tools and sex furniture, might also be called sex toys. People in most countries can buy them, and they are used by both men and women.
title: Sex toy
